title.narrative: University of the South Pacific Scholarship Scheme: Field Research Work for Students

description.narrative: The Australian Centre for International Agricultural Research (ACIAR) and the University of the South Pacific post-graduate scholarship scheme supports 10-12 candidates per year in Agriculture/Horticulture, Forestry, Fisheries and Agribusiness to undertake studies at PhD, MSc or PG-Diploma level. The scheme is open to students from Fiji, Kiribati, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tonga, Tuvalu and Vanuatu. For their thesis research, students are hosted by an ACIAR project in the region, giving them hands-on experience of scientifically sound, problem-solving research.
